channel.title: Dragon Claws Special 4 hits on Battlescape
channel.description:
Dear everyone,
i've tried loads of things.. create new methods and changing wep speeds, but tbh.. yeah i fucked it up, can someone teach me or show a tutorial how i make "Dragon Claws Special with 4 hits" On battlescape?? Note: 4 hits pl0x.
Edit: i got so far: Dust R I P's Dragon claw emote working + 2 hits + 50% spec drain ect, ect, ect.
